post:
How to Start a WEB HOSTING BUSINESS in 2021 (VIDEO)

how much does it cost to start a web hosting company, how to start a cloud hosting company, how to start a domain and web hosting company, how to start a game server hosting company, how to start a hosting company, how to start a hosting company from home, how to start a vps hosting company, how to start a web hosting company, how to start a web hosting service company, how to start a work from home business, how to start my hosting business, work from home businesses April 10, 2021 @ 12:00 pm, by raindog308

Most of the time, we feature industry news, or tutorials as a “guest post”. From time to time, we also want to bring to you interesting finds, related to the hosting industry that we’ve discovered. Our goal is to provide a full range of content for you to enjoy, both from provider-contributed content and ones that we find ourselves. Enjoy!

Do you remember how difficult it was to start a business before the Internet era? It was a very slow process that took time. With the power of the Internet, you can now start a successful business from home, at short timeframes that were previously unimaginable and unattainable.  People quite literally have new ideas in the morning and have a business up and running by the afternoon.

I came across this video on RackNerd’s YouTube feed today which went over how to create a hosting company with less than a $50 budget, and thought it was worth sharing considering a lot of community members here are entrepreneurs. RackNerd is a known provider around these parts, who was recently voted #1 within the LowEndTalk community, voted by community members. They are very engaged with the community and their customers, and we love that they are willing to preach and also help others become successful. This is what the community should all do, among each other!

We always enjoy seeing hosting companies go above and beyond the normal ways, and start creating video content. It creates a very professional impression and shows for their branding. In this video I came across, Dave from RackNerd goes over ideas on how to start your own web hosting business. Some members of our community want to start their own hosting company, or have ideas on it, but just don’t have the proper direction or foundation. I think this video should help point those to the right direction.

As the video outlines, all it takes is a few things, with the main part being a reseller hosting account so that you can start creating and selling shared hosting accounts.

Here are some reseller hosting offers from RackNerd, that we recently featured right here on LowEndBox, which you can use to get started with starting your own hosting business. It’s worth mentioning that these exclusive promotions they shared with the LowEndBox community, are significantly cheaper than the website plans that the video references. Receive the ultimate value just by being apart of the LowEndBox community!
